content: तिरस्क(स्का)रिणी {@--1@} A curtain, veil; तिरस्करिण्यो जलदा भवंति <ls>Ku. 1. 14</ls>; <ls>M. 2. 1</ls> {@--2@} An outer tent, screen of cloth. {@--3@} A kind of magical veil (or spell) rendering the wearer invisible; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> and <ls>V. 2</ls>, {%inter alia%}. It is properly the science or art possessed by celestial beings of rendering themselves invisible by repeating some {%Mantras%}.
